Alignment.Name: Lawful Good
Alignment.Description: Can be counted on to do the right thing as expected by society.

Alignment.Name: Neutral Good
Alignment.Description: Do the best they can to help others according to their needs.
Alignment.WhoIs: Many celestials, cloud giants, most gnomes

Alignment.Name: Chaotic Good
Alignment.Description: Act as their conscience directs, with little regard for what others expect.

Alignment.Name: Lawful Neutral
Alignment.Description: Act in accordance with law, tradition, or a personal code.

Alignment.Name: Neutral
Alignment.Description: Prefer to steer clear of moral questions and do not take sides, just do what seems best at the time.

Alignment.Name: Lawful Evil
Alignment.Description: Methodically take what they want, within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order.

Alignment.Name: Neutral Evil
Alignment.Description: Those who do whatever they can get away with, without compassion or qualms.
Alignment.WhoIs: Many drow, some cloud giants, yugoloths

Alignment.Name: Chaotic Evil
Alignment.Description: Act with arbitrary violence, spurred by greed, hatred, or bloodlust.
